com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.storage.plugin

Class PluginSettingsStoresFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.storage.plugin.PluginSettingsStoresFactory

  • public class PluginSettingsStoresFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating PluginSettingsStores. The PluginSettingsStore is used to store and load PluginSettings. To get an instance of this class use GuiFactory.pluginSettingsStores().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected PluginSettingsStoresFactory(RawStoresFactory rawStoresFactory)

      Creates a new plug-in settings store for storing settings in a file.

    • Method Detail

      • createApplicationPluginSettingsStore

        public PluginSettingsStore createApplicationPluginSettingsStore(ApplicationStore applicationStore)
        Creates a PluginSettingsStore using a ApplicationStore as back end.
        See: ApplicationStore
        Parameters:
        applicationStore - The ApplicationStore to be used.
        Note: You also could use the same as for the AcrolinxClient using AcrolinxClient.getStore().
        Returns:
        the plugin settings store

      • createFilePluginSettingsStore

        public PluginSettingsStore createFilePluginSettingsStore(File storeFile)
        Creates a new plug-in settings store for storing settings in a file.
        Parameters:
        storeFile - the file for storing settings
        Returns:
        the plug-in settings store

      • createPropertiesPluginSettingsStore

        public PluginSettingsStore createPropertiesPluginSettingsStore(PropertiesStore propertiesStore)
        Creates a PluginSettingsStore using a PropertiesStore as back end. See: PropertiesStore also see: ApplicationStore
        Parameters:
        propertiesStore - the properties store
        Returns:
        the plugin settings store
